transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (clears throat) Greetings, citizen, and welcome to my show.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Well, thanks for having me here, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: Please, identify yourself to the universe.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: My name is Michael Moore, and, um, I'm, I'm really nobody.

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (LAUGHS) That can't be true, I wouldn't have "nobody" on my show!

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Hey, can we, can we stop for a second?

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: Of course.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Okay. You're not actually Space Ghost, are you?

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (beat) (inhales through teeth)

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: I wasn't prepared for, I thought it was actually going to be the character.

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (hands over his face) Yes, sir.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: You're like a really bad reader that's reading the script. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: Well, actually... I'm an intern, and -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (enters) Former intern! I thought I told -

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (scrambles off screen)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You better run, Joey!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to set) Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (reading a book) Eh, I wasn't ready.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Eh, I'll do it again.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Time?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ehh! (invisos out, then invisos to desk) Time.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Again! (invisos out, then back in, out of breath) Time.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oooh. 5.8.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, one, one more time, once more.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: The guest is waiting,

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let him wait! I need to get that time down to 3.5 by six o'clock Sunday or I'm a dead man!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, did I say 5.8? I meant... 2.3.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes! I'm saved!

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (off stage, clapping) Nice going, sir. Congratulations!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, didn't I order you to revoke Joey's security clearance?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Get off my back, I'm not your slave.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes you are.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I am? Uh, well, what was I s'posed to do?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Never mind, it's too late. The one they call Joey walks among us.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: He just wants a job.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's just what he wants you to think.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, it's workin'. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, send in my first guest.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (groans, throws lever. Monitor lowers with Michael Moore)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hi, Mike. Eh, sorry about all the trouble before. That punk was supposed to be banned from the premises.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: No no no, it's okay, I'm, you're fine. It just threw me, that's all.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: If you just... want to go back to bed, I'll understand.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: That's okay, that's okay. We can start again.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: From the top?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Yes.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stop tape. (beat)

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Space Ghost, uh, (laughs) I think you might just have something, uh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And, roll tape. Ladies and gentlemen, please welcome Michael Moore!

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Uh, thanks for having me here, Space Ghost, it's, uh, it's really great.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So Mike, have you ever actually watched my show?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Really?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: All the time, every week, in fact.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're kidding!

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Of course I'm kidding. (laughs) I've never seen this show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What part do you like best?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: No no, you're not listening, Space Ghost, I've never seen this show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Do you prefer the comedy, or the interviews? Or both!

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: No, no, Space Ghost, hello! Hello!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I've seen all your stuff too.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Okay, give me an example.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Give you an example.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay. (beat) Now?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Yes, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Do I have to?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: (points at Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alright, uh, I remember you were there...

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Mm hm.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And you were talking to the man...

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Uh huh.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The man, what was it, what... Rambo.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: No, no.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And, there were these things...

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Things, uh, you haven't seen any of my stuff, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Seen all of it.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Oh, oh, that, yeah, you know, out here, like in the real world, you know, like where we have only eight cable stations...

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (whispers) Excuse me. Zorak, sir.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (grunts)

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (whispers) Down here. Did you get a chance to read those scripts that I sent you?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No! Go away.

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: (whispers) I'll just leave my résumé here for you.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Get outta here!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (notices) Joey!! (fires his power bands, Joey scurries out of the way, Zorak takes the blast instead)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Aaaa!! (coughs)

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, how ya doin' over there?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, I'm bleeding.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He's fine, Mike.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Moltar is, uh, over there, hey, how ya doin', Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I'm being exploited.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He's fine too, Mike. Now, tell me more about Texas.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost is a monster. You should really blow the cover off this rathole.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Help me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, Michael doesn't want to hear about your silly personal problems.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He's much more interested in doing one of his irreverent docu-comedies about me. Right, Mike?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Now, what am I supposed to do? Am I supposed to, follow you around, or, find out who your corporate owners are?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure, follow me around. What do I care?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: So who are your corporate owners, Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, it's complicated, but (taps cards) basically, I belong to God.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Ohhhh.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's right, Mike, God owns me. He speaks to me through his subsidiary, Time-Warner.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Yes, you know, they own Roger and Me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Roger and I, Mike.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Yes, so we're sort of like corporate brethren here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Roger's your brother.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: (interlocks hands, raises eyebrows)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ohhhh, I get it.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Let's say "hi" to all our friends at Time-Warner. (waves) (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (waves) Hello, friends.

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: "I love beans?" You know, that song means so much to me.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know, I wrote that song while I was eatin' some beans.

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: That's awesome.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So Michael, what do you think of the Ghost Planet?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: It's, it's, it's, uh... I've, I've been in worse places.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Name one.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Well, um, it's, it's a kid's show, isn't it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Actually, no. My audience is comprised largely of retired naval officers. Ahoy, gentlemen. I salute you. Mike, have you ever been to the Caspian Sea?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Some people think it's a lake. But they're so wrong.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's a lake!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's a sea!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's a lake!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's a sea!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What, ya been there?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (beat) (glares at Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (glares at Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's a sea, Mike.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Uh huh. And, and where are you actually put together, Space Ghost, like, who draws you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh... a bunch of guys.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: A bunch of guys, where at?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, some kids do it, somewhere. I'm, I'm not sure.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, it probably, is this, is this animation done in the United States?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I think so. Is that part of Korea?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: They don't make much money, I know that. (laughs cruely)

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What are you doin' here?

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: Would you mind if I just stood over here and watch you work?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Alright, but stay out of my way. I can't be distracted.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: What's the budget on this show, anyways?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Not much, I'll tell you that. Want to know why? I'll let you in on a little secret, Mike. I don't pay anybody! My staff here - they work for free! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Oh, really?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, yeah. My overhead from this show is virtually nothing, except for an occasional bowl of water and bucket of slop...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (to Joey) Listen, I'm gonna take a nap. You stay here, and if anything goes wrong, run and get me.

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you bet! You can count on me, sir. You just -

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Don't touch anything! (walks out of control room)

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: Thank you! (waves)

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Well, yeah, I guess I'd like, I'd like to find out, uh, who put you up to this, who controls you. And basically, uh, you know, how you're treating your, uh, employees here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, they're enslaved.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Mm, okay.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, it's not the kind you're thinking of. This is the good kind.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Lies! All of it!

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: The bandleader over here isn't so sure about that.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What, Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I need a five minute break.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No breaks, get back to work!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Then I'll need a spit trough.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sorry, we're over-budget as it is. My six week "Humor on the Rhine" junket nearly busted us.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: And how about a piano bench? I've been squattin' for four years!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sit down on your own time. I don't pay you to sit.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You don't pay me at all!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You'll get what I give you and like it! (to Mike) You see, Mike, here in space we're all equals. Except for Moltar and Zorak. Isn't that great? Want him to do anything for you, Mike? Shall he dance for your pleasure?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (Zorak stares back in surprise)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts at Zorak's feet) Dance, mantis! Dance for Michael's pleasure!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ow! Hey, my foot! ow!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (while blasting) Hey, Mike, aren't you impressed by my power over my lowly subordinates?

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Oh, come on. They're helping you do this show here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (finished blasting Zorak) Pffft. They're not worth the paper I line their filthy cages with.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You make me sleep in my own debris!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Excuse me. (casually walks over to the bandstand, and punches Zorak in the face, then walks back, humming to himself)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Pfeh!

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: You are down on him today!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm down on him every day, Mike. He's morally bankrupt.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: He's, he's the glue that holds this show together here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, please!

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: The man, he gives and gives and gives for you. On this show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's best not to make nice with Zorak. He'll eat you faster than a Swiss blacksmith at a corkboard convention.

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: I prob-, I probably look like a month-long meal to him, don't I? (laughs) Stay away. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Michael Moore
transcript.dialogue: Uh oh. We just lost our camera. (Michael's image on monitor starts zooming in and out, in and out of focus)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What's happening there? Moltar! Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Joey!

transcript.speaker: Joey
transcript.dialogue: I'm sorry, sir, it'll never happen again.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You got that straight, son. (blasts Joey, who crumples to the ground) Take that!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (returns) Whoa! What's goin' on in here?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Joey messed up my show. So I messed up his face.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You didn't use your power bands on him, did you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. (laughs) Isn't that right, Joey?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Joey?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: He doesn't look so good.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I don't know, he looks okay to me. (nudges Joey's head with his foot) Big cry-baby. Get rid of him.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You get rid of him.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs in disgust)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This could cost me my career. (beat) Way to go, Joey!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Great show, everybody. See you next week. (laughs) I hate that guy.
